item.title: Git Hooks
item.description: tl-dr python django project git hooks tutorial for automating certian tasks and explaination about git hooks What are git hooks Git hooks are scripts/programs that Git executes before or after a particular event occurs in a Git repository. Git hooks are a built-in feature - no need to download anything. Git hooks are run locally. they are placed in hooks directory to trigger actions at certain points in gitâ€™s execution.
